UI_TEXT.存储到PNG文本块的文本内容: Text content to store in PNG text block
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~到目前为止，你通过此节点总共保存了{total_cou:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes! You have saved images {total_count} times with this node!
The default save path is 'output/ZML/[current_date]'. Clearing the path saves to 'output'. Custom paths outside of ComfyUI are supported.
'Text Block Storage' writes text into the PNG, useful for saving prompts. Use a 'Load Image' node to extract it.
'Clear Metadata' reduces file size. When used with 'Text Block Storage', it first clears metadata, then writes the text block, resulting in a small file with your prompt but no workflow data. This pairs well with image scaling.
'Save .txt File' saves a text file with image name, resolution, metadata status, and text block content.
Filename convention: The separator is '#-#'. 'Forward' normalization reads text before the first '#-#'. 'Backward' normalization reads text after the last '#-#'. For example, from 'Action#-#000001#-#InADream.PNG', 'Forward' gives 'Action', and 'Backward' gives 'InADream'.
Enjoy using ZML Nodes!
